thread.title: These are the exercise classes you need to try
thread.title_full: These are the exercise classes you need to try - Telegraph

author: Eleanor Doughty
title: These are the exercise classes you need to try
text: If you're looking for some brilliant exercise classes at which to meet like-minded people your age, and get fit at the same time, then look no further. GoodLife's bumper get fit guide is here - we'll keep updating it as and when we find the best exercise classes for the older athlete. Harrogate What: Tai Chi When: Mondays, 2-3 pm Where: Friends Meeting House, Queen Parade, Harrogate How much? £4 a class, including and biscuits For more information, click here Liverpool What: Rock & Rumba: a bit of dance and a bit of aerobics When: Fridays, 11-11.45 am Where: Spindles Gym, Adelphi Hotel, Ranelagh St, Liverpool, Merseyside L3 5UL How much? £4 a class For more information, click here Have you tried Tai Chi? Photo: Alamy Scotland What: Pilates When: Thursdays, 7-8pm Where: Boroughmuir Rugby Club, 1st Floor Function Rooms, Meggetland Wynd, Edinburgh, EH14 1XN How much? £72 for 8 weeks For more information, click here Stretch it out with some pilates Photo: Alamy Norfolk What: Exercise focused on keeping your mind active When: Tuesdays 9 - 10; 10.15-11.15 am Where: Dickleburgh Village Centre, Harvey Lane, Dickleburgh, Diss, Norfolk, IP21 4NL How much? £5 per class For more information, click here Warwickshire What: Aerobics When: Wednesdays, 10.30-11.30 Where: The Sports Centre, Rugby School, Horton Crescent, Rugby CV22 5DJ How much? £3.30 For more information, click here A bit of gentle aerobics can work wonders Photo: Alamy West London What: Everything from cardio to muscle strengthening, especially for the older person Where: St Mary's Church, 1 The Mt, London, W3 9NW When: Tuesdays, 9:45am How much? £6 For more information, click here East London What: Zumba Gold When: Tuesday, 11 am - 12 pm Where: The Sundial Centre, 11 Shipton St, London, E2 7RU How much? £2 a session For more information, click here Zumba is fun and can be taken at any speed you like Photo: Alamy Brighton What: Keep fit classes When: Tuesdays, 10-11am Where: Alive Fitness and Natural Health, 25-27 Castle St, Brighton, East Sussex BN1 2HD How much? £4.65 For more information, click here Reading What: Zumba Gold When: Fridays, 10.30-11.30am Where: Loddon Valley Leisure Centre, Lower Earley, RG6 4GD How much? £2.50 For more information, click here Doing exercise classes is a great way of meeting new people Photo: Clara Molden Harpenden What: All-over fitness When: Thursdays, 7-8pm Where: Southdown Methodist Church Hall, 130a Southdown Road, Harpenden, AL5 1PU How much? £3.60 a class For more information, click here Minehead What: Table tennis When: Fridays, 10am - 12pm Where: The Lawns Community Centre, Minehead, TA24 5RQ How much? £2.50 For more information, click here @telegoodlife
